# Read Data
```{r}
load(file="data\\cleanedData.Rdata")
weather
```


# Equipment Plotting
## Autoplot variables of interest
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
hist(equip$totalHeat)

autoplot(equip, .vars=totalHeat)
autoplot(equip, .vars=fanEnergy)
autoplot(rooms, .vars=totalHeat)
autoplot(totalEnergy, .vars=totalHeat.AHU)
autoplot(totalEnergy, .vars=totalHeat.room)
autoplot(totalEnergy, .vars = totalHeat)
autoplot(totalEnergy, .vars = totalEnergy) + ggplot() + geom_line(data=weather, x= weather$obsTimeLocal, y=weather$tempAvg)
```

## Seasonal plots
```{r}
gg_season(equip, totalHeat)
gg_season(fill_gaps(equip), totalHeat, period = "day")
gg_subseries(fill_gaps(equip), totalHeat, period = "day")

gg_season(fill_gaps(equip), fanEnergy)
gg_season(fill_gaps(equip), fanEnergy, period = "day")
gg_subseries(fill_gaps(equip), fanEnergy, period = "day")

```

# Room Level Plotting
```{r}
hist(rooms$totalHeat)
ggplot(data=rooms, aes(x=time, y = totalHeat)) + geom_line() + xlab("Time") + ylab("Total Heat (kW)")
autoplot(rooms, .vars=totalHeat)

```
